body_html: @ezyang yes, I would also like to track it down properly. I think this diff is a good short-term patch to unblock people who are running into this (losing ccache for these files is unfortunate, but not the biggest deal since they shouldn't be rebuilt often). I've opened #13362 against myself to track this down more thoroughly.

body: @ezyang yes, I would also like to track it down properly. I think this diff is a good short-term patch to unblock people who are running into this (losing ccache for these files is unfortunate, but not the biggest deal since they shouldn't be rebuilt often). I've opened https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/13362 against myself to track this down more thoroughly.
